message: Hey Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really love! I'm asking $120 for it. What do you think?
Hey Alice, $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $100. What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget. I can't go all the way down to $100, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about $110?  Let's make this work!
